name: Super Smash Tennis Pro
description:
How to play :

use two gamepads to play. yup, that's mandatory.

LB/RB : hit the ball in a normal way. How boring. hitting the ball fills your smash gauge tho.

LT/RT : lemme  S M A S H

Left Stick : move the character, up for jumping a little.

Right Stick : move your racket and the direction in which your next shot will be fired.

Credits : 

Art :
